Describe your issue: Member of my team, Dalys Hensley, is unable to create anything under our team. She opens a new project, it just says "Connecting..." up at the top. When she switches to her personal Canva (that is not pro) it allows her to create and save, so it is not a connectivity issue, but she does not have access to the pro designs or fonts. Can you explain why this is happening and/or fix it? I do not want to pay for a subscription that will not work.

Today, I am trying to create a new flyer & keep getting the same issue.  I am testing sizes using your images and keep getting the same error.
I am using the free version and cannot upgrade to Pro for a variety of reasons.  Please correct this issue.

Thank you.
